Articles.Content:
When I'm trying to land to the runway with a spaceplane, at least one of the KSC building self-destructs suddenly. And first, one of my plane wing part disappears leaving a dust behind, then other parts of my plane gets separated. So landing fails. Please help with this. 

(I'm trying to land from space, so making a reentry into atmosphere. I think this causes explosions and other bugs.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-08T15:18:11Z" title="03/08/2015 03:18  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 8, 2015</time> by TYRT**
This is a known bug and there is currently no known fix. Your plane actually crashed into the building (somehow), destroying the wing parts and taking out the building.
So it's not only happening in my game. Do you know Squad said about this bug? Or what do you think, they will fix it on 1.0?

This is a very well known bug and if you can land the plane after this event then you have some skill.

Come and share your experience on this thread.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105214-Share-your-experiences-with-the-parts-hitting-building-bug](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105214-Share-your-experiences-with-the-parts-hitting-building-bug)
